section.name: Overview of the Custom Project Directory Structure
section.p: The portal-archetype generates a complete Maven-2 project directory structure for developing a custom Jetspeed portal as well as JSR 168 portlet applications. Here is an overview of directories created by the portal-archetype (directories are relative to the custom portal root):

tr.td: conventional subdirectory location for one or more portal application projects
contains portal deployment builds and resources.
conventional subdirectory for one or more portal component projects
maven-2 build to create an J2EE enterprise archive (EAR) deployable file
custom portal application component Spring assemblies
custom decorations in images, layout, and portlet subdirectories
custom portal PSML pages to augment/override minimal defaults, (e.g. /Administrative/**, /default-page.psml, /myaccount.psml, /page.security, and /system/**)
custom overrides for Jetspeed2 layout portlet templates

table.tr:
etc/webapp
custom content reaources to be packaged with portal application

tr.td: portal application war build scripts and webapp resource overrides
these directories are an artifact of archetype expansion and should be deleted
